original_text: It is true that God makes dead people become alive again. Moses showed us this in his report about the bush in the wilderness. He told us that our Lord God is the God of Abraham. He is the God of Isaac. And he is the God of Jacob.
korean_text: 죽은 자가 살아난다는 것은 모세도 가시나무 떨기에 관한 글에서 주를 아브라함의 하나님이요 이삭의 하나님이요 야곱의 하나님이시라 칭하였나니

sentences.original_text: It is true that God makes dead people become alive again
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님께서 죽은 사람들을 다시 살리시는 것은 사실입니다

sentences.original_text: in his report about the bush in the wilderness
He told us that our Lord God is the God of Abraham
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 우리 주 하나님이 아브라함의 하나님이라고 말했습니다

sentences.original_text: He is the God of Isaac
And he is the God of Jacob
